description:
ZecWallet is a z-Addr first, Sapling compatible wallet and full node for zcashd that runs on Linux, Windows and macOS.. It has full support for all Zcash features:
* Send + Receive fully shielded transactions
* Supports transparent addresses and transactions
* Full support for incoming and outgoing memos
* Fully encrypt your private keys, using viewkeys to sync the blockchain
summary: ZecWallet is a z-Addr first, Sapling compatible wallet and full node for zcashd that runs on Linux, Windows and macOS.
author: Aditya Kulkarni
